job_description:
Manager, Digital Services Sales

Zyxware Technologies is seeking a Sales Manager to join our Sales team. The primary goal is to generate revenue from assigned geographies by identifying potential new customers, presenting the company's brand, and building long-term client relationships.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve target revenue and margins.
  • Responsible for sales planning and accurate forecasting.
  • Determine clients' needs through a consultative selling approach.
  • Manage the sales pipeline with qualified leads and prospects.
  • Present the organization's values, commitments, and capabilities to clients and at events.
  • Manage revenue booking and collections and maintain reports.
  • Manage escalations from client accounts.

Preferred Skills/Experience:

  • A graduate degree in engineering or computer science, coupled with an MBA, would be preferred. Graduate degrees in other fields are accepted if there is a demonstrated interest in technology
  • Familiarity with frameworks and tools for understanding markets and international trade.
  • Ability to construct value chains and define industry structure.
  • Experience developing and executing a sales plan.
  • Experience designing and executing a sales process for mid-sized and large enterprises.
  • Experience partnering with HR to build a sales team.
  • Consistent track record of revenue generation and risk management.
  • Experience handling B2B clients from US/Europe/UK/ME/APAC regions.
  • Knowledge of Google Workspace / MS Office, CRM, and Bid Management.
  • Strong communication & presentation skills.
  • Prior experience in dealing with decision makers in the services sector.
  • US Business Visa preferred.

Qualifications:

  • 5+ years of relevant international sales experience in IT or Digital Services

Location:

  • Technopark, Trivandrum

Contact:

If you meet the above requirements, please mail in your resume with the subject ‘Application for the post of Manager, Digital Services Sales - MS30092402' to careers@zyxware.com.

Company Information:

Zyxware Technologies (P) Ltd SBC 2205, II Floor, Yamuna Building, Technopark Phase III, Trivandrum, 695583 http://www.zyxware.com
summary: Seeking a Sales Manager to generate revenue by developing client relationships in assigned geographies. Requires 5+ years of international IT sales experience and strong communication skills.

job_description:
Product Operations Executive - Digital Health SaaS

NeedStreet Web Technologies (P) Ltd Padmanabham, Technopark, Trivandrum, 695581 http://www.continuouscare.io

We are seeking a customer-focused Product Operations Executive to bridge our healthcare clients and technical teams. You will provide expert support for our B2B digital health platform, manage technical setups, and ensure seamless customer experiences.

Core Responsibilities:

  • Product Support: Handle inquiries on product features, issue investigation, and resolution, collaborating with other teams as needed.
  • Customer Onboarding: Support customers in setting up their preferred product configurations, including white-labeling and configuring their 3rd party service accounts.
  • Customer Success: Help customers derive the best value from product features by engaging and educating them on optimal product usage.

Preferred Skills/Requirements:

  • Strong technical aptitude with web and mobile apps, embracing technology for efficient workflows.
  • Exceptional communication skills for both customers and technical teams.
  • Demonstrates initiative, ownership mentality, and analytical problem-solving abilities.
  • Process-oriented thinker who optimizes workflows for maximum efficiency.
  • Knowledge steward who actively maintains and updates team documentation and knowledge bases.
  • Customer value champion who leverages interactions to help clients maximize product ROI.
  • Balances customer advocacy with organizational priorities.
  • Understands healthcare technology environments, security, and compliance considerations.
  • Previous experience supporting a SaaS product.
  • 1-3 years experience in product support for technology platforms.
  • Qualification in any field is acceptable, provided the above requirements are met.
  • Must be willing to work in hybrid mode (i.e., at the office).

This role offers the opportunity to make a significant impact at the intersection of healthcare and technology, working with a collaborative team focused on delivering exceptional client experiences.
